comment: Browser chooser that routes URLs to different browsers based on user-defined rules

org.freedesktop.Flatpak.reason: Required to launch Flatpak browsers and run xdg-settings on the host to manage default browser settings

--filesystem=host:ro.reason: Browser discovery requires reading .desktop files from /usr/share/applications (native apps).

--filesystem=xdg-data/flatpak:ro.reason: Access to Flatpak browser exports in ~/.local/share/flatpak/exports/share

--filesystem=/var/lib/flatpak:ro.reason: Access to Flatpak browser exports in /var/lib/flatpak/exports/share

--filesystem=/var/lib/snapd:ro.reason: Access to Snap browser .desktop files in /var/lib/snapd/desktop
